question:
With reference to the recent renaming of a major port after Dr. Shyama Prasad Mukherjee, consider the following statements:
  1. It is the oldest port in India.
  2. It is a freshwater port.
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: Statement 1 is correct: The Port of Kolkata was recently renamed as Dr. Shyama Prasad Mukherjee Port. The port recently celebrated its 150th anniversary. It is the oldest port in operation in India. It was established by the British East India Company in 1870. Statement 2 is correct: The Port of Kolkata is a freshwater port. It is the only major river port in India. It is located on the Hooghly River. It has 2 dock systems: Kolkata Docks at Kolkata and the Haldia Dock Complex at Haldia. It has one of the longest navigational channel in the world.
